edu.kit.scc.dem.wapsrv.app

Class CorsConfiguration

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.kit.scc.dem.wapsrv.app.CorsConfiguration

  • public class CorsConfiguration
extends java.lang.Object
    This class centrally manages all CORS relevant configuration
    Author:
    Matthias Dressel, Michael Hitzker, Markus Hoefler, Andreas Loeffler, Timo Schmidt

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      CorsConfiguration(java.lang.String allowedOriginsPath)
      Creates a new cors configuration extracting its base values from the given config

      • getExposedHeaders

        public java.lang.String[] getExposedHeaders()
        Gets the exposed headers in responses. According to CORS Spec * is ok, but it is not yet implemented in the majority of browsers.
        Returns:
        The exposed headers
        See Also:
        https://Developer.mozilla.org
